modName: Skyrim Lore Friendly Vanilla Nightsky Retexture 4k
summary: Lore Friendly Retexture of The Skyrim Nightsky ( Galaxy,Stars and Auroras )
descriptionHtml:
[center]Ok so after a few Requests from my Environment I have decided to make this ones here.Some of you may know my other work for Skyrim Galaxy and Nightskys. But they were all not Lore Friendly so here it is.
This Pack is absolutely Lore Friendly cause no new or any strange Textures have been added. I have just improved the Vanilla Skyrim Nightsky and Retextured it to new higher more Sharpen Resolution !
I have made a little bit contrast and color improvemend too. You will absolutely have the Vanilla Skyirm feeling when using this without changing the Story of Skyirm. Of course everybody else can use this Mod, even if it doesnt matter for you if you want to stay with the Lore of the Game !
Thea Auroras are also Retextured and Improved.


This Pack Contains:

1 - Skyrim Galaxy - Vanilla  ( Improved ) 4096x2048

2 - Skyrim Skystars - Vanilla ( Improved ) 4096x4096

3 - Skyrim Auroras - Vanilla ( Improved )  4096x2048



PLEASE ENDORSE ME IF YOU LIKE IT !



Dont forget to take a look at my other Mods.





Credits to Bethesda Softworks for this Beautiful Game

Credits to Nexus Networks for letting us all share this Awesome Mods.



Thanks to all of you !

HXP[/center]
author: HXP
